files.patch:
@@ -101,3 +101,3 @@
-  return is_marked() &&              // Page is marked
-         is_segment_live(segment) && // Segment is marked
-         _bitmap.at(index);          // Object is marked
+  return is_marked() &&                               // Page is marked
+         is_segment_live(segment) &&                  // Segment is marked
+         _bitmap.par_at(index, memory_order_relaxed); // Object is marked
